patterns: What job openings does Intech Systems have?

We have various job openings available. Please visit our website for more information.

patterns: How can I apply for a job?
responses: To apply for job send your CV at: recruitment@intech-systems.com

patterns: What is the process of hiring?
responses:
1. First you need to send your CV at: recruitment@intech-systems.com 
 2.After shortlisting of the CV, candidates have to go through one Online assesment and the two interview rounds.

patterns: What technical skills are required for a technical consultatnt ?
What abilities are needed for technical consultant?
responses: The skills required for a technical consultant at Intech Systems include proficiency in any programming languages such as C programming, C++ Java, C#, or Python and also the knowledge of database.

patterns: What are the skills required for project manager?
What abilities are needed for project manager?
responses: Key skills for a project manager at Intech Systems include project management experience, leadership skills, excellent communication, and the ability to manage resources effectively.

patterns: What are the skills required for project lead for business central?
Key skills for Business central project lead?
Business central project lead required skills?
What abilities are needed for business central project lead?
responses: Intech Systems seeks a Project Lead with 5+ years' experience in Dynamics Business Central/Navision, sound knowledge of all modules, experience leading teams of 3-4, and delivering 5+ end-to-end implementations.

patterns: What are the key skills required for the SharePoint Developer?
What abilities are needed for SharePoint Developer?
responses: For SharePoint Developer candidates must have experience designing and configuring SharePoint Online applications using CSOM, JSOM, SSOM, SPServices, Office 365, and SPFx. Proficiency in InfoPath Form Development, AngularJS, ReactJS, C#, PowerShell, Microsoft 365, Microsoft 365 SharePoint Online, SharePoint Server (On-Premises), and REST API is essential.

patterns: What are the skills required for D365 Finance Consultant?
Key skills for D365 Finance Consultant?
What abilities are needed for D365 Finance Consultant?
responses:
We are seeking a Dynamics 365 Project Operations Functional Consultant with 3+ years of experience in Dynamics 365 CE and Project Operations/Project Service Automation.
 The ideal candidate will have expert knowledge of Dynamics 365 Project Operations or Project Service Automation (PSA) and working knowledge of Power Platform, Azure and related technologies.
 They will lead the delivery team through all stages of the project, be the initial point of contact for customer concerns, and author high-level documentation. Strong communication, client-facing, and interpersonal skills are required.
 For more details you can refer this link https://intech-systems.com/careers/dynamics-365-project-operations-functional-consultant/

patterns: What are the skills required for Azure Technical Lead?
Key skills for Azure Technical Lead?
What abilities are needed for Azure Technical Lead?
responses:
2 + years of C#, Web API, .NET (Core and Framework), xUnit, SQL Server
 Microservices and server less architecture with service fabric, functions and api apps, service bus, message queues
 Visual Studio, TFS, VSTS and GIT
 Modular programming in JS, Angular 6/4+, Type Script and other front-end unit testing tools
 Expertise with Azure Active Directory, VNETs, NSGs, ASGs, OAuth and OpenID Connect, Azure traffic manager, CDN, App Gateway and load balancers
 CI/CD, DevSecOps, setting up and managing Build and release pipelines

patterns: What are the skills required for Azure Data Analystics?
Key skills for Azure Data Analystics?
What abilities are needed for Azure Data Analystics?
responses:
Azure Data Factory, Azure Data Lake, Data Bricks, Python
 Deploying and managing Microsoft Azure technologies (Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL DB, Azure SQL DW, Azure Data Lake, Analysis Services, Cosmos DB). 
 Experience implementing Azure Data Factory Pipelines using latest technologies and techniques

responses: For Business Development Executive(BDE) role candidate must have : Positive attitude and willingness to work, Excellent communication skills , Experience in ERP sales/ CRM sales/ Enterprise software sales shall be preffered and Good to have experience in International Market.

responses: For D365 Business Central Conusultant candidate must have experience as software implementation consultant, ERP knowledge, excellent functional knowledge of SCM, FM, Taxation, inventory, manufacturing cost. MS Office expertise, good business process knowledge, English communication, travel flexibility. Prior US/UK client & Business Central experience preferred.
